item.title: [small RELEASE] Just to protect me and my servers rep
item.dc:creator: @F_BaBy F BaBy
item.description:
@F_BaBy wrote:

So out of nowhere lefty msgs me on msn saying i stole his k/d ratio(even though myne is just a k/d counter, yah leftys a moron), so i had to prove him wrong.
He says he released his, i never seen it so here is mine just for proof.
Oh, and i sent him myne before i posted this so if he goes and post it saying its his, you know not to believe it.(pics)

The page for the site.(www.swagpk.com/kdratio.php)

<?php // This script was downloaded at www.Sup3rnova.org // Please do not remove the copyright data // Enjoy and if you need any help email me at Shaun@sup3rnova.org define('ROOT', './'); include ROOT.'common/common.php'; include ROOT.'common/header.php'; $personrow = $_GET["personrow"]; $stat = $_GET["stat"]; $table = $_GET["table"]; $show = $_GET["show"]; $person = $_GET["person"]; // set your username and password and change localhost to the IP of your MYSQL server unless it is hosted locally... $con = mysql_connect("localhost","",""); if (!$con) { die('' . mysql_error()); } // change the line below to Demonik or whatever your database is... mysql_select_db("dbname", $con);

$result = mysql_query(“SELECT * FROM user_credentials ORDER BY kills DESC LIMIT 0,20”);
?>

k.d ratio - TOP 20

<?php $count = 1; while($row = mysql_fetch_array($result)) { echo '
Rank: '.$count.'
User: '.$row["user"].'
Kills: '.$row["kills"].'
Deaths: '.$row["deaths"]."
"; echo "
"; $count++; } ?>

<?php 
include ROOT.'common/footer.php';</blockquote>

Lefty saying he coded this.

Oh, isn’t your server rscd and mine divine? How would that work? Dumbass.

The server side shit is easy as fuck, the declarations and db shit is already in the divine source.

Read full topic
